document.masterDocTitle: A revision of Othiini. XX. Two new species of Othius, the first record of the genus from Myanmar, and additional records (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylininae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A revision of Othiini. XX. Two new species of Othius, the first record of the genus from Myanmar, and additional records (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylininae)

C o m m e n t: The above female from the Kanin Peninsula represents the first record from the region between Fennoscandia and the Yenissey region in Siberia. Only few records of
O. lapidicola
were previously known from Armenia ; the material listed above reveal that the species is very common in this country.
